Apply this serum liberally all over your face before makeup; the pearlescent finish will have your skin glowing in seconds. Along with Goji berry and Kakadu Plum, Rosewater gives a high dose of Vitamin C for a complexion that's smooth and radiant. 07 of 10.'}, {'url': 'https://www.byrdie.com/physicians-formula-super-cc-color-correction-care-cream-review-5525862', 'content': 'A blend of hyaluronic acid, squalane, and niacinamide calm and hydrate while SPF 40 protects against harsh UV rays . ILIA's Super Serum Skin Tint SPF 40 Aced My 12-Hour Wear Test. IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream with SPF 50+ ($42): This award-winning full-coverage CC cream comes in a whopping 12 shades that range from fair to deep.'}, {'url': 'https://www.thequalityedit.com/articles/physicians-formula-makeup-review', 'content': 'Made for Sensitive Eyes. Physicians Formula. Butter Believe It! Eyeshadow - Bronzed Nudes. $13.49. Credit: Physicians Formula. Even a gust of wind can make sensitive eyes start to stream with tears. So for those with delicate skin, the thought of wearing shadows can often invoke nothing but an image of a makeup disaster.'}, {'url': 'https://www.womenshealthmag.com/beauty/a39442023/physicians-formul-bronzer-review/', 'content': 'Physician's Formula's $10 murmuru butter bronzer is TikTok-famous and Amazon reviewer-loved. It comes in eight glowy, bronze shades with a natural satin finish. ... It has 23,000 five-star reviews ...'}, {'url': 'https://blog.mapleholistics.com/blog/physicians-formula-review/', 'content': 'Physicians Formula Highlighter Review. Physicians Formula does not make a straight up highlighter as of now, but there is the Powder Palette Mineral Glow Pearls and the Bronze Booster 2-in-1 Glow Boosting Bronzer+Highlighter. The glowy look of the pearl compact comes from an overspray which is somewhat misleading, but still gives a nice effect.'}]

thought: The WHOIS information indicates that the domain for physiciansformula.com is registered to Markwins Beauty Brands, Inc., which is a legitimate and existing company with a physical address in City of Industry, CA. The domain has been registered since 1997, which suggests the website has been in operation for a significant amount of time. The contact details provided are consistent with business use, and the domain status includes clientTransferProhibited and serverUpdateProhibited, which are typical for legitimate domains to prevent unauthorized transfers and changes. There is no evidence of a scam based on the WHOIS data. The website appears to be legitimate based on the content analysis, hyperlink structure, and WHOIS information. Before making a final determination, I will retrieve the certificate information to ensure the website's security and authenticity.
